1.title: Into the Heart of Coldness/The Remarkable Beardini!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

1.plot: Jake goes to ShiverJack's frozen fortress to rescue the Penguins of Ch-Ch-Chilly Canyon. The Remarkable Beardini, a pirate magician, thinks Jake stole his Invisibility Ring.

2.title: Escape from Ghost Island/The Island of Doctor Undergear

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

2.plot: The ghoulish Captain Wraith turns Hook, Smee, and Jake into ghosts! Captain Jake sets out on a quest to repair Captain Gizmo, but Doctor Undergear has other plans.

3.title: Rise of the Pirate Pharaoh/The Golden Hook

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

3.plot: Jake and the crew accidentally awaken the Pirate Pharaoh! Captain Hook finds the Golden Hook, which turns anything it touches into gold!

4.title: Mystery of the Mighty Colossus/The Doubloon Monsoon

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

4.plot: Captain Colossus's ex-first mate, the Grim Buccaneer, tries to take the Mighty Colossus. Captain Hook & Mama Hook race against Bones & Grandpa Bones to find the Doubloon Monsoon.

5.title: Shark Attack!/Captain Hook's Colossal Collision

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

5.plot: Captain Jake must save his ship, the Mighty Colossus, when Doctor Undergear attempts to sink it. Captain Hook steals the Mighty Colossus and Captain Jake has to stop him.

6.title: Phantoms of Never-Nether Land/Magical Mayhem!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

6.plot: Captain Jake helps his matey Treasure Tooth rescue Peg-Leg Peg from the prankster ghosts. Captain Hook steals the Remarkable Beardini's magical Rings.

7.title: Monkey Tiki Trouble/Jake's Cold-Hearted Matey

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

7.plot: The magical Monkey Tiki causes Captain Hook and King Zongo to switch brains! ChillyZack uses his frozen powers to try and capture Captain Jake and his crew.

8.title: The Great Never Sea Conquest! Part 1

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: Dread the Pharaoh!/Sharky Unchained!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

9.plot: The ex-genie Dread is freed from his bottle by the Pirate Pharaoh's mummy cat! Sharky slips away from the Jolly Roger to help Captain Jake and his crew to protect Never Land.

10.title: Captain Quixote/Captain Hook's Crocodile Crew

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

10.plot: Captain Jake meets a Spanish pirate who is on a quest to capture El Blanco, the White Squid! Captain Hook becomes King of the Crocodiles.

11.title: The Creature of Doubloon Lagoon/Minotaur Mix-Up!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

11.plot: Captain Hook chases after the mysterious Gill Creature in pursuit of "a mighty treasure." Captain Hook transforms into the Minotaur of Argos!

12.title: Pirate Fool's Day!/The Forbidden City

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

12.plot: On Pirate Fools Day, Peter Pan's shadow arrives on Never Land to prank everybody! Captain Chen asks Captain Jake to assist him in finding a cure for his Dragon Curse.

13.title: Attack of the Pirate Piranhas/March of the Lava Monsters

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

13.plot: When Captain Hook ruins the shipwreck lunch for a school of Pirate Piranhas, the feisty fish follow him home! Captain Hook finds a magical medallion that creates lava monsters!

14.title: Beardini's Apprentice/Mummy First Mate

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

14.plot: Cubby has difficulty learning to use a magic wand during a lesson with the Remarkable Beardini. The Pirate Pharaoh commands the Pirate Mummy to be his First Mate.

15.title: Crabageddon!/Night of the Stonewolf

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

15.plot: Captain Jake, King Crab, and Crab Louie team up to oust Doctor Undergear. Captain Hook tricks Jake and his crew into finding the legendary Stonewolf Treasure.

1.title: Hide the Hideout!/The Old Shell Game

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

1.plot: Jake sets out to protect his home.

2.title: Hats Off to Hook!/Escape from Belch Mountain

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

2.plot: Jake and his crew find Captain Hook's hat washed up on shore.

3.title: Off the Hook/Never Say Never!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

3.plot: Captain Hook takes off with Jake's skateboard.

4.title: Yo Ho, Food to Go!/Basketballs Aweigh!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

4.plot: Captain Hook swipes the food Cubby has perpared.

5.title: The Sky's the Limit/Bucky Makes a Splash

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

5.plot: Jake and his crew fly kites!

6.title: Happy Hook Day!/No Returns!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

6.plot: Jake, Izzy and Cubby throw a 'Happy Bird-day Birthday' party for Skully.

7.title: Izzy's Pirate Puzzle/The Never Land Games

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

7.plot: Captain Hook swipes Izzy's puzzle box.

8.title: Free Wheeling Fun/The Race to Never Peak!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

8.plot: Captain Hook steals the bicycle that Jake, Izzy and Cubby are riding.

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

10.plot: Jake and his crew get surfing tips from their friend, Marina the mermaid!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

11.plot: Captain Hook mistakes Cubby's map for a treasure map.

12.title: The Never Bloom!/Jake's Starfish Search

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

12.plot: The kids are excited to see a rare flower that only blooms every 100 years.

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

13.plot: Someone has stolen treasure from both Jake's crew and Hook's crew.

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

15.title: The Elephant Surprise!/Jake's Jungle Groove

15.plot: Hook and Smee hide inside a wooden elephant presented to Jake's crew.

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

16.plot: Jake and his mates must retrieve a golden egg from Captain Hook.

17.title: Save the Coral Cove!/Treasure Chest Switcheroo

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

18.title: Birds of a Feather/Treasure Show and Tell!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

18.plot: Jake and his crew fly to Skybird Island to help Skully's bird-friend.

19.title: The Pirate Princess/The Rainbow Wand

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

19.plot: Izzy and the crew set out to rescue a princess.

20.title: The Sword and the Stone/Jake's Home Run!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

20.plot: Hook and Smee stumble upon concealed treasure.

21.title: Captain Hook's Parrot/SkyBird Island Is Falling!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

21.plot: When the Jolly Roger begins to sink, Captain Hook names Mr. Smee the new captain of the ship.

22.title: Trick or Treasure/Night of the Golden Pirate Pumpkin

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

22.plot: Jake sets off for the Pirate Pumpkin Patch to find the Golden Pumpkin.

23.title: The Pirate Pup!/Pirate Rock!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

23.plot: Jake's puppy runs off with one of Hook's boots.

24.title: It's a Winter Never Land!/Hook on Ice!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

24.plot: Jake and his crew wake up to find Peter Pan left presents on the beach!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

25.plot: Peter Pan returns to Pirate Island.

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

4.plot: Jake and his mates all gather around the campfire to hear Pip the Pirate Genie share fabulous tales of his travels around the Never World.

5.title: Cubby's Crabby Crusade/The Never Sands of Times

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

5.plot: Jake sets out for King Crab Island to rescue Cubby after he is "crab-napped."

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

6.plot: Pip the Pirate Genie's magic goes out of whack when he gets a case of the sneezes.

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

7.plot: Mr. Smee is transformed into the dashing "Buck Buccaneer" for Red Jessica's Pirate Convention.

8.title: The Never Land Coconut Cook-Off/The Lost and Found Treasure

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

8.plot: A giant coconut souffle beast grabs Izzy and carries her up Belch Mountain!

9.title: Jake's Mega-Mecha Sword/Tick Tock Trap/Hideout... It's Hook!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

9.plot: Jake and his crew must convince Captain Hook to kiss his old enemy, Queen Coralie, who slumbers under the influence of an evil spell.

10.title: Play It Again, Cubby!/Trading Treasures

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

10.plot: Jake leads his mateys on a lyrical adventure across all of Never Land.

11.title: The Singing Stones/The Mermaid Queen's Voice

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

11.plot: Jake helps a family of singing stones return to Comet Island.

14.title: Hook's Treasure Nap/Princess Power!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

14.plot: Captain Hook can only remember where he buried Captain Cuddly Bear's toy ship, the S.S. Binky, when he's asleep and dreaming.

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

15.plot: Captain Hook's childhood nanny, Nanny Nell, arrives to help "James" get his ship ship-shape.

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

16.plot: Hook turns into a genie with Bones as his master!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

18.plot: Jake and his crew must convince Captain Hook to kiss his old enemy, Queen Coralie, who slumbers under the influence of an evil spell.

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

19.plot: Boo! Jake and his crew help Treasure Tooth the Ghost Pirate search the Never Sea for his lost Golden Figurehead.

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

20.plot: Hook is determined to save Red Jessica from her duplicitous new pirate pal.

21.title: Battle for the Book!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

21.plot: Jake, Izzy, and Cubby go to London to save Wendy's book from Hook before it's too late.

23.title: ShiverJack/Treasure Tunnel Trouble

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

23.plot: The evil ShiverJack arrives in Never Land to turn it into his icy domain using a powerful icicle-staff. Captain Hook swipes treasure from Bones' bug-friends, the Buddybops.

24.title: Grandpa Bones/The Arctic Pearl

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

24.plot: Hook and Jake's crews set out to find the treasure of Captain Buzzard who turns out to be Bones' Grandpa! Jake and his crew help their penguin pal, Percy, find his best mate Pearl.

25.title: Mer-Matey Ahoy!/Pirate Pinball

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

25.plot: Jake helps Finn the Mer-Boy to stop an electric eel from causing Never Land into a storm; Jake and his crew take their challenge in a life-sized pinball game in order to find a hidden treasure.

26.title: Jake's Awesome Surprise/Aye, Aye Cap'n-Cap'n!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

26.plot: It's Jake's birthday, and Izzy, Cubby and Skully set out to find him a special treasure. When Sharky and Bones are left in charge of the Jolly Roger, there are "two" many Captains!

27.title: Captain Frost/The Legendary Snow-Foot!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

27.plot: Jake helps a visitor from the frozen Never North, Captain Frost, find a gem that has been stolen by Captain Hook. In search of treasure, Bucky and Cubby get frozen atop a mountain.

28.title: Look Out... Never-Sharks!/The Monkey Pirate King

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

28.plot: Finn, the Merboy, takes Jake on an underwater excursion to go Wreck Racing. Then, the Monkey Pirate King Zongo and his crew take over Jake's Hideout.

29.title: Stowaway Ghosts/Happy 1000th Birthday!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

29.plot: It's the Pirate Mummy's 1000th birthday, and Jake's present, a sand surfboard, helps the Mummy save his new pirate ship. Jake and his mates help Hook get rid of trickster phantoms.

30.title: Flight of the Feathers/Captain Hookity Hook

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

30.plot: Skully joins the Feathered Four on their 100th mission when the leader sprains his wing. When Hookity-Hook swipes the Captain's treasure map, Jake and his crew enlist Captain Gizmo!

31.title: Dread the Evil Genie/Sandblast!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

31.plot: Jake and his mates help Pip the Pirate Genie from being captured by Dread, the evil genie. Jake, Hook and Captain Flynn race their new sand sail-wagons in the Never Land Desert!

32.title: Captain Hookity-Hook/Flight of the Feathers

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

32.plot:

33.title: Captain Buzzard to the Rescue!/Croctastrophy!

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

33.plot: Captain Hook asks Jake and his crew to rescue Sharky, Bones and Mr. Smee. Then, when Captain Hook is besieged by baby crocodiles, Jake and his crew must hunt down Nanny Nell.

34.title: The Great Never Sea Conquest

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

34.plot: When an evil Mer-Wizard, Lord Fathom, is released from an underwater prison, he sets out to take over the Never Sea by awakening a giant, three-headed sea serpent, the Strake!

37.title: Captain Scrooge

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

37.plot: In this pirate Christmas Carol, Captain Scrooge is visited by the ghosts of Past, Present and Future. The ol' cranky crook learns about sharing treasure with your mateys.

-1.title: Tiki Maskerade Mystery/The Tale of Ratsputin

episode of.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates (TV Series 2011–2016)

-1.plot: Jake and his crew head off to Tiki Tree Forest for the Tiki Maskerade! The mateys go on a spine-tingling search for a legendary spooky critter, Ratsputin, the Giant Bilge Rat!

imdb.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates
plot: An animated TV show that follows a band of young pirates who spend their days competing against Captain Hook and Mr. Smee for treasure.::Anonymous
